data.name: Arch of Orazca
data.oracle_text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{5}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

data.name: Die Young
data.oracle_text: Choose target creature. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters), then you may pay any amount of {E}. The creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each {E} paid this way.
data.flavor_text: "When the time comes, let go. Nothing lasts forever."

card_faces.name: Dusk
card_faces.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater.

card_faces.name: Dawn
card_faces.oracle_text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Return all creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Essence Scatter
data.flavor_text: Dependence on luck is anathema to Kefnet's rigorous studies. Those who hope to escape his maze by chance never succeed.

data.name: Garna, the Bloodflame
data.oracle_text:
Flash
When Garna, the Bloodflame enters the battlefield, return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from anywhere this turn.
Other creatures you control have haste.

data.name: Goblin Chainwhirler
data.oracle_text:
First strike
When Goblin Chainwhirler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker they control.
data.flavor_text: "The trick is, once you get moving, don't stop!"

data.name: Longtusk Cub
data.oracle_text:
Whenever Longtusk Cub deals combat damage to a player, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Pay {E}{E}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Longtusk Cub.

data.name: Nicol Bolas, the Ravager // Nicol Bolas, the Arisen
data.type_line: Legendary Creature — Elder Dragon // Legendary Planeswalker — Bolas

card_faces.name: Nicol Bolas, the Ravager
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
When Nicol Bolas, the Ravager enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
{4}{U}{B}{R}: Exile Nicol Bolas, the Ravager, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card_faces.name: Nicol Bolas, the Arisen
card_faces.oracle_text:
+2: Draw two cards.
−3: Nicol Bolas, the Arisen deals 10 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
−4: Put target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
−12: Exile all but the bottom card of target player's library.

card_faces.name: Prepare
card_faces.oracle_text: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn.

card_faces.name: Fight
card_faces.oracle_text:
Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)
Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls.
